sentences.en: After pigging herself on ice cream she went upstairs.
sentences.cn: 大吃特吃了一通冰激凌之后她上了楼。

sentences.en: Eleanor went upstairs to say goodnight to the children.
sentences.cn: 埃莉诺上楼去跟孩子们道晚安。

sentences.en: Frances invited them to occupy the upstairs of her home.
sentences.cn: 弗朗西丝邀请他们住在她家的楼上。

sentences.en: I was banished to the small bedroom upstairs.
sentences.cn: 我被赶到了楼上的小卧室。

sentences.en: I went upstairs and had a shower.
I'll take my coat upstairs. Shall I take yours, Roberta?
sentences.cn: 我要把我的外套拿到楼上去。罗伯塔，要我把你的也拿上去吗？

sentences.en: John will show you upstairs, Mr Penry.
sentences.cn: 约翰会带你上楼，彭里先生。

sentences.en: Less than a half hour later he returned upstairs.
sentences.cn: 不到半个小时，他又跑上楼来。

sentences.en: Marsani moved into the upstairs apartment.
sentences.cn: 马萨尼搬进了楼上的公寓里。

sentences.en: She climbed the steps and proceeded along the upstairs hallway.
sentences.cn: 她爬上楼梯，顺着楼上的走廊走去。

sentences.en: She’s upstairs in bed feeling ill.
sentences.cn: 她身体不舒服，在楼上躺着。

sentences.en: The boys are curled asleep in the small bedroom upstairs.
sentences.cn: 男孩们蜷缩在楼上的小卧室里睡熟了。

sentences.en: They actually moved down from upstairs because the rent's that expensive.
sentences.cn: 他们确实从楼上搬到了楼下，因为房租太贵了。

sentences.en: When he went upstairs five minutes later, she was fast asleep.
sentences.cn: 他5分钟后上楼时，她已睡熟。

sentences.en: When the great man arrived, the club's manager personally escorted him upstairs.
sentences.cn: 那位要人到达时，俱乐部经理亲自陪他上楼。

sentences.en: Why don't you go upstairs and lie down for a bit?
sentences.cn: 你不为什么不上楼去躺一会儿呢？

sentences.en: You don't have to go running upstairs every time she rings.
sentences.cn: 用不着她一来电话你就往楼上跑。

words.tran_cn: 在楼上，向楼上；上楼；往楼上

trans.tran_en: An upstairs room or object is situated on a floor of a building that is higher than the ground floor
towards or on an upper floor in a building
one or all of the upper floors in a building
